dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Violation]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, April 02, 2005 1:44 PM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Violation]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------
From: - Sat Apr 02 13:40:27 2005
X-Mozilla-Status: 0001
X-Mozilla-Status2: 00000000
Received: from [172.16.214.180] (helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail.theplanet.com with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)        (Exim
4.50)        id 1DGsHS-0004j1-T0        for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Wed, 30 Mar 2005
23:31:46 -0600
Received: from spooling.theplanet.com ([69.56.141.4]
helo=lili.theplanet.com)        by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)        with smtp (Exim)        id
1DGsHR-0001uC-2Y
for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Wed, 30 Mar 2005 23:31:46 -0600
Received: (qmail 23323 invoked from network); 31 Mar 2005 05:31:44 -0000
Received: from unknown (HELO ?216.185.111.52?) (172.16.214.110)  by
lili.theplanet.com with SMTP; 31 Mar 2005 05:31:44 -0000
Received: from [172.16.214.180] (helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail.theplanet.com with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)        (Exim
4.50) id 1DGsHO-0004ig-Em        for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 30 Mar 2005
23:31:42 -0600
Received: from ensim03.ffm.m2soft.com ([195.38.20.12])        by
mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from mike@renn.tv)        with esmtps
(TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1DGsHK-0001r3-8H        for
abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 30 Mar 2005 23:31:42 -0600
X-ClientAddr: 80.135.105.33
Received: from mikelifebook (p50876921.dip.t-dialin.net
[80.135.105.33])        (authenticated bits=0)        by ensim03.ffm.m2soft.com
(8.12.10/8.12.10) with ESMTP id        j2V5TsDM005178; Thu, 31 Mar 2005
07:29:55 +0200
Message-Id: <200503310529.j2V5TsDM005178@ensim03.ffm.m2soft.com>
From: Mike Frison <mike@renn.tv>
To: <adamyellen@hotmail.com>
Date: Thu, 31 Mar 2005 07:29:41 +0200
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain;        charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook, Build 11.0.6353
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2180
Thread-Index: AcUvdwTiqJAwNwPgSE69qByroIwNBA==
X-M2Soft-MailScanner-Information: Please contact the ISP for more
information
X-M2Soft-MailScanner: Found to be clean
X-MailScanner-From: mike@renn.tv
Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 195.38.20.12 is neither
permitted nor denied by domain of renn.tv)        client-ip=195.38.20.12;
envelope-from=mike@renn.tv;        helo=ensim03.ffm.m2soft.com;
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -98.2
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Violation
X-BeenThere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.5
Precedence: list
List-Id: abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -98.2

Dear Sirs,
this video BMW M3 GTR Onboard H.J.Stuck
http://www.dgtalpimp.com/m3_gtr_nurburgring.wmv violates our copyrights. We
have bought the sole rights from BMW for publishing and distribution. We
request immediate deletion of this file from your servers and will
investigate further legal action. Given appr. 10.000 downloads from your
site and a sales price of 19,90 Euro for the DVD you will be facing a claim
in the area of Euro 200.000 (USD 260.000).

Further distributions of this file will also be taken into account to
calculate the complete monetary loss we are facing due to this unauthorised
publishing. We never intended to release this footage via Internet. Please
make sure all these copies are deleted.

We need the address of the website owner "dgtalpimp". You do not provide a
complete imprint on your website.
Please reply in writing either by email or by letter to:

renn.tv
FSZ N
